name: clockwork sub
description:
#2buttonsjam!

Created for the 2 button Jam. You are a submarine and you must collect as many coins as you can before you are eaten. You can run out of fuel. There are 5 levels.  The windows build seems to be working fine. Enjoy!

Z = Rotate

X = Move 

P.S. The unity web player creates a small white square over all of my scenes. If you know about this dm me on twitter(@internetpaulicy) I'd like to know how to fix it.
